name: Mind Zero
summary: Mind Zero is an action-packed dungeon-crawler RPG. Play as Kei, a high school student whose life turns upside down when he forms a contract with a “MIND,” a weapon/being with deadly powers. With the government and other forces trailing him and his friends, Kei will need to discover the secret behind “MIND.” Will these newfound powers help him or ultimately be his doom?

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players assume the role of a young student (Kei) who must battle monsters assisted by his MIND, a weapon/being with deadly powers. Players explore dungeons and engage in turn-based battles with fantastical enemies (e.g., scorpions, wolves, axe-wielding sheep). Some characters use weapons such as swords and scythes, while their MIND's use energy blasts or explosions to deplete enemies' life meters. One cutscene depicts the aftermath of an attack in which a character is depicted lying in a pool of blood. Some MIND's and female characters wear outfits that reveal large amounts of cleavage; one creature is briefly depicted topless. The words “sh*t” and “b*tch” appear in the dialogue.
